skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Spot Quarry
skills.books:

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Huntmaster
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%

Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on an ally for 1 turn each time the ally has a debuff resisted by an enemy.
skills.name: Lead the Pack
